column4: Short sellers lose nearly $2 bln in Tesla tug-of-war
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 21 Short sellers have been at the losing end of a tug-of-war with Tesla Inc investors in 2017  with some surrendering in recent weeks following nearly $2 billion in losses as shares of the electric car maker approach record highs.

column4: BRIEF-Nokia and Intel launch 5G acceleration labs
column5: * Nokia and Intel launch 5G acceleration labs in U.S. and Finland to help operators bring 5G innovations to market
